title: E-bike battery fires spark call to regulate like fireworks
description: A charity says batteries for e-bikes should require third-party approval before being sold in the UK.

title: Cyber attack affects two south England ambulance services
description: NHS England is working to reconnect the systems of the South Central and South Western trusts.

title: UN warns of risk of having smartphones in school
description: But less than one-in-four countries have laws or policies prohibiting them, the United Nations found.
